labels.label: 删除指定版本的其他文件，并且更新日志记录表
将FTP文件内容插入数据库
将FTP文件基本信息插入日志表
修改控制文件名 添加后缀.tmp

entry.value: update log_logistic set finish_time = sysdate, tx_count = (select count(1) from temp_logistic where path = (select distinct file_path||'/'||file_name from log_logistic where fetch_time = (select distinct max(fetch_time) from log_logistic where plan_info = '1'))) where plan_info = '1' and fetch_time = (select max(fetch_time) from log_logistic where plan_info = '1')
Lacking activity as of time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')}; flow has been inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes

delete from temp_logistic where version_info = (select version_info from log_logistic where fetch_time = (select distinct max(fetch_time) from log_logistic where plan_info = '1')) and path != (select distinct file_path||'/'||file_name from log_logistic where fetch_time = (select max(fetch_time) from log_logistic where plan_info = '1'))
select file_path,file_name from log_logistic where fetch_time = (select max(fetch_time) from log_logistic where plan_info = '1')
